Reference link should be in the format: [Title](URL)
NOTE: KEEP THE LINK SAME AS GIVEN IN EACH QUESTION END}
How do I open a new RRSP?

To open a new RRSP, follow these steps:
1. Call 1-800-463-3863 and select the Investments option before midnight (local time) of March 1, 2010. Our investment specialists are available by phone 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
2. Visit your local RBC Royal Bank branch by the close of the March 1, 2010 business day. Schedule an appointment by calling ahead.
Reference: [RBC Direct Investing - Open New RRSP](https://www.rbcroyalbank.com/onlinebanking/bankingusertips/investments/rrsps/index.html#2)

You will be provided queries from customer service department. Your task is to answer the question using only the provided steps with reference at the end. NOTE: KEEP THE LINK SAME AS GIVEN IN EACH QUESTION END}
How do I remove a zero-balance GIC from my balances?

Zero-balance GIC accounts will be automatically removed from your Account Balances page 14 months after the last active investment or redemption. Zero-balance GICs will remain on your GIC Account Holdings page for 3 months after maturation or redemption.
Reference: [RBC Direct Investing - Zero-Balance GICs](https://www.rbcroyalbank.com/onlinebanking/bankingusertips/investments/gics/purchase.html)

You will be provided queries from customer service department. Your task is to answer the question using only the provided steps with reference at the end. How can I place a trade with RBC Direct Investing account?

To access your accounts and trade with RBC Direct Investing, follow these steps:
1. Online Investing Site:
   - Go to the RBC Direct Investing website.
   - Log in to your account using your credentials.
   - Navigate to the trading section of the website.
   - Follow the on-screen instructions to place trades.
2. Automated Telephone Service:
   - Dial 1-800-769-2560 to reach the automated telephone service.
   - Follow the prompts to access your accounts and place trades.
3. Investment Services Representatives:
   - Dial 1-800-769-2560 to reach investment services representatives.
   - Speak with a representative to receive assistance with your investment instructions.
Reference: [RBC Direct Investing - Access Account](https://www.rbcroyalbank.com/onlinebanking/bankingusertips/investments/adirect/trade.html)
